Sunhawk points his rifle at Drillbits nose.

Sunhawk:  With a little luck you'd be in the Pit right
now, but your not so don't worry about it and start
talkin', where's your base.

OOC: Remember Sunhawk strapped him down so he can't
fight back.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> OOC: To move the story I'll just assume DrillBit has
> beenr evived by the medics.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He slowly came out of stasis. His optic sensors
> returned to normal operation capability.
> 
> "Wha... what happaned? Where am I?"
